Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.lucene

Class Summary
DocumentEnum An abstract class that enables the LuceneSearchEngine to extract the com.lucene.document.Documents from a collection, when it is constructing an index.
LuceneConstants A "constants container" for the package.
LuceneQueryProcessor Processes queries, modifying the filter and ranking to support only the operations Lucene can handle.
LuceneSearchEngine An implementation of DocSearchEngine that utilizes the Lucene search engine to index and access a local collection.
LuceneSetup Used by the LuceneSearchEngine to orchestrate the generation of the index, meta-attributes, and content-summary files.
